subject: [Radiance-general] [help] Does the "direct horizontalirradiance" in GenCumulativeSky mean the "direct normal radiation" in .epw
body:
weather file?

Hi:

The relationship is: Direct Normal Irradiance = Diffuse Horizontal
Irradiance / Sin(Sun_Altitude)

Regards,

Jia
